text: Which of the following is a correct statement about Convertible Reserved Instances?

answers.text: Convertible Reserved Instances can be sold in the Reserved Instance Marketplace.
Convertible Reserved Instances are Reserved Instances that can be moved from one region to another.
Convertible Reserved Instances can be given back to AWS with a pro-rata amount paid back to you.
If you meet requirements, you can exchange Convertible Reserved Instances for another Convertible Reserved Instance with a different configuration.
